text:
ExecOnline|Data Warehouse Engineer| New York, NY |

In less than five years, ExecOnline has become the leading online provider of leadership development to senior leaders, growing rapidly by 70% each year.

We are looking for an individual to lead efforts to create and maintain our system architecture to support our data warehousing and reporting efforts. This is a hands-on position that will work directly with our software development and business teams to bring ExecOnlineâ€™s data capabilities to the next level.

Check out the job here: https://careers.jobscore.com/careers/execonline/jobs/data-wa...
